channel.title: [PI] Cannot change home? [PI]
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape forums, I have been learning how to mess around with a server recently, and the main problem I have is that I cannot change home.
I've tried to change the co-ordinates, yet it still spawns at the same home that the source came with.
I know this is a simple question, please don't troll me.
Thanks in advance, Peace.

item.title: [PI] Cannot change home? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

[quote=“Mr__Destruction, post:5, topic:433718”]Derpington, it still doesn’t work, I tried editing config.java and compiling.

Very confused at this point in time, do I get a new source? It’s a bitch to set up on a VPS -.-

Thanks in advance,
Peace.[/quote]
Lol, at first i thought you were making fun of him by calling him “Derpington.” That is how you’re suposed to change it unless it’s in player class or something. If the issue keeps up change sources.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Cannot change home? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

x=3093 y=3493 - Edgeville

Change the coords to the one I just gave you, compile, and done

If it still doesn’t work for some reason, feel free to ask me.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Cannot change home? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Destruction Mr__Destruction
item.description:
@Mr_Destruction wrote:

This is what I have at the moment, trying to make Edgeville the respawn and start point.

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2310; public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3781; public static final int RESPAWN_X = 2310; public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3781;
